NFTGemClaimCreated(address,address,uint2.details: Event generated when an NFT claim is created using base currency

NFTGemClaimRedeemed(address,address,uint.details: Event generated when an NFT claim is redeemed

NFTGemCreated(address,address,uint256,ui.details: Event generated when a gem is created

NFTGemERC20ClaimCreated(address,address,.details: Event generated when an NFT claim is created using ERC20 tokens

NFTGemERC20ClaimRedeemed(address,address.details: Event generated when an NFT erc20 claim is redeemed

addAllowedToken(ComplexPoolLib.ComplexPo.details: add a token that is allowed to be used to create a claim

addInputRequirement(ComplexPoolLib.Compl.details: add an input requirement for this token

addToken(ComplexPoolLib.ComplexPoolData.details: create a token of token hash / token type

allTokenHashes(ComplexPoolLib.ComplexPoo.details: get the token hash at index

claimAmount(ComplexPoolLib.ComplexPoolDa.details: return the claim amount paid for this claim

claimQuantity(ComplexPoolLib.ComplexPool.details: the claim quantity (count of gems staked) for the given claim hash

claimTokenAmount(ComplexPoolLib.ComplexP.details: return the claim token amount for this claim hash

claimUnlockTime(ComplexPoolLib.ComplexPo.details: the lock time for this claim hash. once past lock time a gem is minted

collectClaim(ComplexPoolLib.ComplexPoolD.details: collect an open claim (take custody of the funds the claim is redeeemable for and maybe a gem too)

createClaims(ComplexPoolLib.ComplexPoolD.details: attempt to create a claim using the given timeframe with count

createERC20Claims(ComplexPoolLib.Complex.details: crate multiple gem claim using an erc20 token. this token must be tradeable in Uniswap or this call will fail

gemClaimHash(ComplexPoolLib.ComplexPoolD.details: return the claim hash of the given gemhash

increaseDifficulty(ComplexPoolLib.Comple.details: increase the pool's difficulty by calculating the step increase portion and adding it to the eth price of the market

mintGenesisGems(ComplexPoolLib.ComplexPo.details: mint the genesis gems earned by the pools creator and funder

nextClaimHash(ComplexPoolLib.ComplexPool.details: the hash of the next claim to be minted

nextGemHash(ComplexPoolLib.ComplexPoolDa.details: the hash of the next gem to be minted

purchaseGems(ComplexPoolLib.ComplexPoolD.details: purchase gem(s) at the listed pool price

removeAllowedToken(ComplexPoolLib.Comple.details: remove a token that is allowed to be used to create a claim

requireInputReqs(ComplexPoolLib.ComplexP.details: checks to see that account owns all the pool requirements needed to mint at least the given quantity of NFT

stakedToken(ComplexPoolLib.ComplexPoolDa.details: return the token that was staked to create the given token hash. 0 if the native token
